item.description:
We would like to invite you to participate in our April Film Fundraiser Earth Day event! This local
Earth Day celebration will feature an important environmental education movie called Earth Days. The film provides viewers an opportunity to learn about the history of environmental issues over the past four decades.

Director Robert Stone concocts this inspiring and hopeful film. Earth Days is a feature documentary that recounts the history of the modern environmental movement. Environmental activism really began with the first Earth Day on April 22, 1970, and precipitated an unexpected and galvanizing effect on the national psyche.

Earth Days is a visually stunning, globe-spanning chronicle of watershed events and consciousness-changing realizations that prompted a new awareness. The postâ€“World War II American dream of a future world created by scientific progress, new technology, and economic expansion was rapidly changing into a nightmare. Earth Days is a truly cogent and powerful depiction of the awakening of the world to environmental reality by a dedicated and skilled filmmaker.

Please see www.earthdaysmovie.com for more information. And please join us on Friday night for the film and discussion.

Friday April 23, 2010
Growing Green Wellness Center
Cost: $10
